ing: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup or Campbell'sÂ® Condensed 98% Fat Free Cream of Mushroom Soup
des: "This traditional casserole made with cut green beans, cream of mushroom soup, and French fried onions is the perfect addition to your holiday table."
ins:
Stir soup, milk, soy sauce, pepper, beans and 1 1/3 cups onions in 3-qt. casserole.
Bake at 350 degrees F. for 25 min. or until hot. Stir.
Top with remaining onions. Bake for 5 min. more.
